Cosi Fan Tutte [arr. Godfrey]
Ruardean, Gloucestershire March contest - 1st Lydney, 2nd Snibston, 3rd Cory, 4th Drybrook. Prizes - 1st £50, 2nd £25, 3rd £10. 7 bands competed.
May 26, 2016, 11:45 a.m. Feb. 18, 2019, 4:22 p.m.
